Reserve Camping - Book Now 2025 Burning Bike Login | Register FAQs Swapmeet 2025 Camping Vendor Info Photos Videos Book Now Book Reservation STEP 1: For RV and primitive camping, first select your nights: Friday, February 27 2026 - Night 1 Saturday, February 28 2026 - Night 2 Sunday, March 01 2026 - Night 3 Monday, March 02 2026 - Night 4 Tuesday, March 03 2026 - Night 5 Wednesday, March 04 2026 - Night 6 Thursday, March 05 2026 - Night 7 Friday, March 06 2026 - Night 8 Saturday, March 07 2026 - Night 9 Sunday, March 08 2026 - Night 10 To Friday, February 27 2026 - Night 1 Saturday, February 28 2026 - Night 2 Sunday, March 01 2026 - Night 3 Monday, March 02 2026 - Night 4 Tuesday, March 03 2026 - Night 5 Wednesday, March 04 2026 - Night 6 Thursday, March 05 2026 - Night 7 Friday, March 06 2026 - Night 8 Saturday, March 07 2026 - Night 9 Sunday, March 08 2026 - Night 10 Quick Date Selection Links: First 5 Nights Last 5 Nights All 10 Nights STEP 2: Then select where you're staying: RV Spot / Full Hook Up RV spots are $75 a night, with $5 daily discount for first or last half, and $10 daily discount for entire 10 days. 30 & 50 amp power, sewer & water. Primitive campsite / Tent Primitive campsite passes are $15 a night or $100 for the entire ten nights. Tent/Dry camping, trailers, anything goes. No assigned spaces. Take up as much room as you need. Pump outs available. No power or water provided. There are multiple fill stations and generators are allowed in designated areas. Walk-Ins welcomed but reservations are strongly encouraged. Primitive campsite / Dry RV Large Campers & RVs are $20 a night or $150 for the entire ten nights. No power provided. Generators are permitted to be used. 30 AMP Primitive campsite outlet ONLY AVAILABLE FOR ALL 10 NIGHTS - Primitive campsite power outlets are $50 a night. They include two people. Non-camping options (Both for all ten days) Semi or Large Trailer Parking Non-campsite parking for semi and large trailers, $100 for 10 Days. Swapmeet Vendor Space 15x30 Outdoor Vendor Space, $150 for 10 days. Multiple spaces can be added on next screen. Fire wood Firewood is available onsite for $25 (30 pieces) or $75 (100 pieces). Booking Summary Item Dates Cost Processing Fee: $0.00 Subtotal: $0.00 Tax: $0.00 Total: $0.00 Please note: You will be prompted for your payment information prior to processing. Once you submit your order, you will be registered automatically. You will also receive an email confirmation of your order. If you have any technical issues, please contact support@fanspike.com. Back to Main Menu Login | Forgot Your Password? Customer Information Payment & Billing Info ATTENTION: ONCE YOU CLICK PROCESS ORDER, GIVE THE SYSTEM 30 SECONDS TO PROCESS YOUR RESERVATION. ONCE YOUR ORDER SUBMITS, DO NOT RESUBMIT. Process Reservation FASTLANE PROMOTIONS, LLC was established in 2004, built on a foundation of fair business practices and attention to detail. We coordinate every aspect of an event including site advertising, development, entertainment, food and beverage. Bike Week Campgrounds - Bike Week Camping | Fastlane Campgrounds Camping - Book Now 2025 Burning Bike Login | Register FAQs Swapmeet 2025 Camping Vendor Info Photos Videos Book Now Fastlane Camping Information Welcome to Fastlane Campground Home of Burning Bike Fastlane Campground is one of the best at Bike Week. Private, quiet, and secure. Hot Showers - Food - Vendors Free Activities and Entertainment 24-hour private security RV FULL HOOKUP RESERVATIONS 30 & 50 amp electric, water, and sewer. Spots are 15 x 50. Room for pop-out or canopy on one side only. End spots are double wide and $40.00 more per night. Park on the grass. No pull-through spots. Parking near RV for cars and trailers. Each RV site includes the first two guests Campers get free passes to the swap meet and Burning Bike located within walking distance on the fairgrounds. RV Hookups area accommodates large vehicles. 30 acres of Primitive Camping area for campers, trucks, tents, and bedrolls. Find out more and book a site at our website or call Troy at (386)956-8540 All campers can enjoy nightly bands food and drinks at the Fastlane Bar & Grill. BOOK NOW! Directions to the Campground Campground Rules Campers are allowed to bring their own firewood, but they can't contain any nails or screws. No pallets The use of golf carts and ATV's are prohibited. Generators in the primitive are allowed only in the designated areas. PETS : Service animals are welcome. Other pets may attend provided they are under their owner's control and not a threat to others. We do not recommend bringing any aggressive or overly protective pets under any circumstances. We might have to ask you to leave if your pet causes problems. Please call if you have a question. FIRES: Are allowed unless County or State has banned them. They must be attended at all times and kept small in size. CAMPSITES: Please keep and leave your campsite clean. Put all garbage and trash in bags. Bags are available at the front gate. GENERATORS, RADIOS, AND OTHER NOISE: Quiet time is 11 pm to 7 am. If you are creating disturbing noise or want to party on please leave the camping area to do so. NO FIGHTING: Both parties will be evicted. NO WEAPONS: Any display of, or use of, a firearm or weapon of any kind will result in your prompt eviction without question. NO FIREWORKS: This could result in bodily injury to other campers. NO RACING: The speed limit in the campground is 5 MPH. Please observe SLOW traffic flow. NO ILLEGAL ACTIVITY : Your responsibility to abide by all laws. NO DUMPING OF GRAY WATER: Keep your area clean and sanitary. Anyone violating the rules or creating problems for other campers will be immediately evicted from the facilities without refund or reentry for the duration of the event. All Fastlane Campground reservations are NON-REFUNDABLE from the time of purchase (no exceptions) You are paying for the camping and the entertainment is free. Your reservation helps Fastlane Promotions & Burning Bike plan a party, obtain performers, and incur a bunch of expenses that simply have to be paid so the party can continue. Thank you for making that all possible these past 16 years. All sales are final. No refunds (unless the event is canceled due to Covid). BOOK NOW! FASTLANE PROMOTIONS, LLC was established in 2004, built on a foundation of fair business practices and attention to detail. We coordinate every aspect of an event including site advertising, development, entertainment, food and beverage. Get In Touch With Us | Bellefonte Campground Home About Accommodations Campground Map Policies Attractions Campground Events Gallery Contact Contact Us Employment Application Park Map BOOK NOW BOOK NOW Home About Accommodations Campground Map Policies Attractions Campground Events Gallery Contact Contact Us Employment Application Park Map BOOK NOW Slide title Write your caption here Button Contact Us at Bellefonte Campground Need help or have a question? We're here to assist you. You can reach us by phone or email, or by simply submitting the contact form below. We value your thoughts and inquiries, and we're committed to responding as quickly as possible. Don't hesitate to get in touch with us about your camping plans at Bellefonte Campground. Getting Here Getting to Bellefonte Campground is simple. Located at 2023 Jacksonville Road in Bellefonte, PA, we are easily accessible via I-99 and I-80 (where they intersect just 16 miles from State College). If traveling from State College, head northeast on I-99 N and take Exit 78 to merge onto US-220 N toward Bellefonte. Continue on US-220 N for about 9 miles, then take the PA-550 S exit toward Bellefonte. You'll find us on your right in approximately three miles. We look forward to meeting you. GET DIRECTIONS Contact Us Name: Email: Phone: Message: Thank you for contacting us. We will get back to you as soon as possible. Oops, there was an error sending your message. Fastlane Campground - CycleFish Sign In Sign Up Loading ... View All Updates Mark All Read fiction Home Motorcycle Events Upcoming Major Events Recent Added Past Events Create New Event Blogs Browse Entries Forum Photos Browse Photos Browse Albums Motorcycle Laws Members Florida Motorcycle Events » Other »    Fastlane Campground -THIS IS A PAST EVENT- Event Details Fri, 
                        Mar 04, 2016 - Sun, 
                         Mar 13, 2016 Volusia County Fairgrounds 3150 E New York Ave Deland , FL 32724 Map/Directions Event Host: Fastlane Promotions Event Contact Info: 386-801-1810 Event Email Event Website More Motorcycle Events • All Motorcycle Events • Major Motorcycle Events • Recently Added Events Follow Us... Event Desc Activity Guests Event Desc Fastlane Campground will open during Daytona Bike week starting Friday March 4th at 10am – 13th 2016, Located at the Volusia County Fairgrounds 3150 E New York Ave Deland Florida. Full RV hookups $50 a night, includes 2 people. Primitive tent camping $15 a night per person or $90 for all 10 days. The event will feature permanent hot showers and restrooms, free Wi-Fi to all campers, food, vendors & Movie nights each evening taking place at the Fastlane Bar & Grill. All campers will have free entry to Fastlane’s Motorcycle Swap Meet & Bike Shows featuring the Wall of Death. The Fastlane Campground will be the of talk of Bike Week this year with our main event “Burning Bike”. This year’s campground theme will be Madd Max, where guest are encouraged to dress up and decorate their campsites to resemble their favorite Madd Max character. We will be having a Madd Max costume contest along with a $1000.00 Bikini Contest. Leading up to Burning Bike  On March 11th  the White Buffalo Band will be playing Main Stage until we will burn a 25’ tall 50’ long wooden motorcycle sculpture down to the ground. Guest all week long can sign and pose for pictures beside the huge wooden sculpture. This will be an event like no other. Hope to see you there. Please call Troy @ 386-801-1810 for resorvations click to rate RSVPs 0 attending 0 maybe attending 0 not attending 1 awaiting reply Event Category: Other Activity The post was not added to the feed. Please check your privacy settings . Nothing has been posted here yet - be the first! Guests This event has 1 guest. EventMan (owner) Awaiting Reply Find Nearby Biker Friendly Places FLORIDA  Motorcycle Laws We make every effort to ensure events listed in the CycleFish Motorcycle Event Calendar are accurate at the time of posting.  However, event organizers sometimes make changes to event details, or cancel the event, without notifying us.  If you find information that is incorrect, please Contact Us and let us know. 2025 Burning Bike Camping - Book Now 2025 Burning Bike Login | Register FAQs Swapmeet 2025 Camping Vendor Info Photos Videos Book Now 2025 Burning Bike Join us at Burning Bike to commemorate your trip to Bike Week. Get your chance to pose for pictures and sign the GIANT wooden motorcycle sculpture before it goes up in flames. The annual Burning Bike continues a tradition that started long ago in the spirit of a lifestyle that so many bikers hold dear. This is a Special Event to Remember a Loved one. Come sign or write a message on the 75' wooden handmade bike before it is burned and all the written messages are sent up above to the ones we love and so dearly miss. Performances by the globe of death, fire dancers, high wire acts, stilt walkers, great food, drinks & vendors. Guests all week long can sign and pose for pictures beside the huge wooden sculpture before we burn it down. This will be an event like no other that you will never forget. There will be daily bike shows/exhibits along with largest swap meet in the central Florida area and on burn night a Bikini contest. All leading to the burning of our namesake bike. The giant motorcycle that has stood as the events centerpiece is crafted entirely of reclaimed wood and is sure to cast flames long into the night. There will be bands, food and fun. Get your chance to pose for pictures and sign the GIANT wooden motorcycle sculpture before it goes up in flames. Burn Party Starts @ 5 pm Friday March 7th 2025 and goes all night long. If you stay in the Fastlane Campground you will have free tickets and walking distance to your campsite. BOOK NOW The pin in the middle is the campground. Daytona and New Smyrna beaches are 20 minutes away. Burning Bike will run through bike week leading to the festival's climax when we burn the bike on Friday March 7th at Fastlane Campground with plenty of parking, a swap meet and acres of camping. Join us as we make "Bike Week History" with the Burning of the Bike. Fastlane has strived to make Burning Bike an all-inclusive experience by meeting the needs of all guests. The easy access parking and short/long term campsites make for a safe, secure, and convenient place to enjoy the festivities, and all that the area has to offer. Whether you've traveled from "around the globe", or rode in from "around the corner". The annual Burning Bike festival promises to give guests a new and unique experience, while maintaining the traditions and mystique that is Bike Week Daytona Beach. If you stay at the Fastlane Campground you get free passes to our Swap Meet and Burning Bike. BIKE WEEK CAMPGROUND We depend on your support and the  generosity of our community to keep the Burning Bike fire lit. The Burning Bike team works year-round to plan, build and preserve our culture. Contact our Event Coordinator: Tasha (954) 394-6531 Tasha_247@yahoo.com Consider joining our efforts by sponsoring Burning Bike today! Contact Us Today! Build a remote team in Malaysia with FastlaneRecruit Resources Blog FAQ Ebook About About Us Our Team Our Partners Jobs For Job-Seekers Careers with FastLane Contact Us About Us FastLane Learn More About Our Story and Our Mission Contact Us Our Story Founded 2013, FastLane Group is a tech-savvy firm offering professional accounting and corporate services. We support your company’s growth, from startup to global expansion, providing customized solutions to meet your unique business needs. We facilitate and introduce our customers to cutting-edge technologies across a suite of professional services, allowing the autonomy to build efficient and effective organizations. We offer a diverse range of professional services including accountancy, auditing, taxation, company formation, offshore formation, company secretary, payroll management and HR advisory assistance, PEO & Employer of Record and Work Visa . Our FastLane CPA Limited is a CPA practice registered with the Hong Kong Institute of Certified Public Accountants (“HKICPA”) and we are also licensed with Hong Kong Company Registry to provide company service business in Hong Kong. At present, FastLane Group nurtures a thriving ecosystem comprising over 1,000 companies and business partners, indicative of our steadfast commitment to facilitating growth. Celebrating a decade of excellence, FastLane Group takes immense pride in reaching this significant 10-year milestone. As part of our celebratory journey, we’re thrilled to expand our expanded presence across various strategic locations. This expansion amplifies our capacity to offer an even more comprehensive range of services, precisely tailored to meet the evolving needs and ambitious global growth plans of our clients.. At FastLane Group, our 10-year anniversary isn’t just a celebration; it’s a testament to our unwavering commitment to your success. Our Mission At FastLane Group, our mission is to forge strong and prosperous partnerships with our customers, empowering worldwide SMEs to achieve business excellence. Through our comprehensive suite of professional services, we provide the tools and expertise to leverage cutting-edge technologies, enabling organizations to thrive with efficiency and effectiveness. As your trusted business builder, advisor, and accountant, we are dedicated to unlocking your full potential and driving sustainable growth in the dynamic business landscape. Our Core Values Our core values empower our collaborative success We Value Teamwork We aim to bring out the best in each other and to create strong and successful working relationships with both our colleagues and customers. We Value Professionalism We respect and bring a positive attitude to work and our interaction with others. We aim to always deliver what we promise to the customers. We Value Integrity We aspire to provide sound expertise and advice whilst being held accountable to the highest professional standards within our field. We strive to maintain our independence and honesty within our practice. Simplify your Accounting with Xero Accounting Software Talk To Xero Expert Xero Platinum Partner We embarked on our Xero journey in 2013, becoming a trusted Xero Platinum partner . Awarded as Hong Kong Accounting Xero Partner of the Year in 2019 & Asia Advisory Partner of the Year by Xero Asia Awards 2024. Our team of Xero experts is dedicated to unleashing the power of Xero for your business, revolutionizing your bookkeeping, credit control, and payroll processes. We offer flexible involvement tailored to your needs. With Xero’s cloud-based platform, collaboration happens seamlessly from any device with an internet connection. Say goodbye to wasted time and unnecessary expenses of downloading or transferring data to your accountant. FastLaneRecruit Building Teams, Powering Growth FastLaneRecruit is an outsourcing and talent acquisition company that facilitates the recruitment and management of remote teams in Malaysia and South East Asia for other businesses worldwide. We enable companies to access a diverse pool of skilled professionals without the complexities of in-house hiring and management. Our tailored solutions help businesses overcome talent shortages, reduce recruitment costs, and expand their capabilities with cost-effective, high-performing offshore teams. As experts in the outsourcing and staffing industry, FastLaneRecruit supports businesses seeking to scale efficiently while focusing on their core operations. Visit FastLaneRecruit’s website to learn more! Visit FastLaneRecruit Hong Kong TCSP Licensee (No. TC007714) We are a Hong Kong licensed Trust Corporate Services Provider. FastLane is delighted to offer a full set of corporate services including company formation in Hong Kong and other jurisdictions to support your entrepreneurial journey. FastLane CPA Limited Hong Kong Certified Public Accountant (Reg No. S0615) Our affiliate firm, FastLane CPA Limited, is licensed by the Hong Kong Institute of Certified Public Accountants (Reg. No: S0615) and subject to rigorous practice review and professional standards monitoring. We offer a unique delivery model with technology that enables us to provide an unrivalled service which has successfully supported more than a thousand companies. Event Desc Activity Photos Guests Event Desc Fastlane Campground will open during Daytona Bike week with Live Bands, Hot Showers, Food, Vendors, Activities, Entertainment and of course the Famous Burning Bike! Full RV hookups $55 a night, includes 2 people. Primitive tent camping $15 a night per person or $90 Weekly. Campground features hot showers, restrooms, free Wi-Fi to all campers, food, vendors & Movie nights each evening taking place at the Fastlane Bar & Grill. All campers will have free entry to Fastlane’s Motorcycle Swap Meet & Bike Shows featuring the Wall of Death. This will be an event like no other that you will never forget.
